title: Trump nuclear: Testing can forever scar a nation. Just ask the Marshall Islands
description:
President Donald Trump’s call for the United States to resume testing of nuclear weapons last week has experts scratching their heads.

What did he really mean – exploding a warhead or testing delivery systems? Does he understand how nuclear weapons work? How will US nuclear adversaries react?

And ...

title: Marshall Islands introduces world's first crypto-based universal income scheme
description:
Photo: CFOTO / NurPhoto via AFP

The Marshall Islands is giving away free cash to its more than 33,000 citizens.

The government announced its universal basic income (UBI) system on Wednesday, with blockchain as its main mode of delivery.

It marks the first system of its kind in the world, where ea...

title: Iran Seizes Marshall Islands-Flagged Tanker in Strait of Hormuz Amid Escalating Tensions
description:
A Marshall Islands-flagged oil tanker transiting the Strait of Hormuz was seized by Iranian forces on Friday, marking the first such interdiction in months in one of the world’s most critical shipping lanes.

According to The Associated Press, a U.S. defense official said the tanker, named the Talar...
